title: Suggestion: A setting for default BOT skill level
body:
Hi Riot,

I'd like to see a setting in the launcher to allow for the selection of the default BOT skill level in BOT games.  

I know most people don't give a crap about this, but I like to work on skills and test new champs and ideas in BOT games, and its currently damn annoying to always have to change every BOT from Beginner to Intermediate every time.  There should be a way to set Intermediate as the default level.

Why do I even play BOT games you ask?  It can be fun to see if you can carry a 4v5 or 3v5 games, in which you are the only human on a team with less players.  It can be quite challenging and fun.

replies.body:
